title: looking for the name of a font
author: TOTEL

comments.content: And a great example of how bad the current practice with descriptive titles work.
“Rich\_s” could be a stretched [Flatiron](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021422/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/flatiron/). The “e” is something else...

Thank you for the answer, and sorry but I didn’t know how this forum works.

I won’t do it again
